subtitleNullable: Air quality metrics measured several times a week
descriptionNullable: ### Rationale EPA provides a variety of great data sources and among them, air quality. To serve the purpose I highly encourage Kagglers to come up with new and creative ideas to work with the data. If you have a great idea that make life of EPA data scientists easier, let them know. (I am not affiliated with EPA) ### Content This dataset shows air quality data metrics for the US (2017 to 2021) and was obtained from EPA.gov. All credits to EPA. ### Acknowledgements and Citation **Using this dataset requires citing EPA and the contributor.** ### Credits for the Cover Image Thank you very much Rodion Kutsaev on Unsplash
